TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit IsExplicitlyDereferenced extends System.Object
public ref class IsExplicitlyDereferenced abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示 Managed 指標會表示方法簽章內的指標參數。

span.span: Indicates that a managed pointer represents a pointer parameter within a method signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C + + managed 的指標和 managed 的參考會發出至中繼資料為指標。In C++, managed pointers and managed references are emitted into metadata as pointers. 若要區別兩種類型的中繼資料中，Microsoft c + + 編譯器適用於 managed 指標這個修飾詞。To distinguish between the two types in metadata, the Microsoft C++ compiler applies this modifier to managed pointers. 它會發出受管理的參考型別上的任何修飾詞。It emits no modifier on managed reference types. 編譯器必須知道正確的呼叫語法，從 中繼資料範圍匯入方法時。Compilers need to know the correct calling syntax when importing a method from metadata scope. 類別和其合作夥伴類別中，釐清從指標參數的參考參數。The class and its partner, the class, disambiguate reference parameters from pointer parameters. 編譯器會發出中繼資料，以變更在 just-in-time (JIT) 編譯器在沒有適當的預設行為時，會處理值的方式中的自訂修飾詞。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 當 JIT 編譯器遇到的 custom 修飾詞時，它會處理修飾詞指定的方式中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 編譯器可以自訂修飾詞套用至方法、 參數和傳回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 編譯器的必要修飾詞必須回應，但可以忽略選擇性修飾詞。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. 您可以將自訂修飾詞發出至中繼資料，使用下列技巧的其中一個：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法這類類別， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 產生 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) 指令檔，其中包含呼叫`modopt`並`modreq`，並組合的檔案[Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用 unmanaged 的反映 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何發出使用反映的組件的物件。The following example demonstrates how to emit an object into an assembly using reflection. [!code-cpp[Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Runtime.CompilerServices.IsExplicitlyDereferenced/cpp/sample.cpp#1)]
